contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Belgium Municipality |name=Musson |picture= |picture-legend= |map=Musson Luxembourg Belgium Map.png |map-legend=Location of Musson in Luxembourg province |arms=Blason Musson.svg |flag=Musson Belgium.svg{{!}}border |region={{BE-REG-WAL}} |community={{BE-FR}} |province={{BE-PROV-LX}} |arrondissement=[[Arrondissement of Virton|Virton]] |nis=85026 |pyramid-date= |0-19= |20-64= |65= |foreigners= |foreigners-date= |mayor=Michel Yans (PS) |majority=[[Socialist Party (francophone Belgium)|PS]], [[Centre Démocrate Humaniste|CDH]] |postal-codes=6750 |telephone-area=063 |web={{fr icon}} [http://www.musson.be musson.be] |lat_deg=49 |lat_min=33.5 |lon_deg=05 |lon_min=42.3 }} '''Musson''' is a [[Wallonia|Walloon]] [[municipality]] of [[Belgium]] located in the [[Luxembourg (province of Belgium)|province of Luxembourg]]. On 1 January 2007 the municipality, which covers 34.81 km², had 4,232 inhabitants, giving a [[population density]] of 121.6 inhabitants per km². ==References== {{reflist}} {{commonscat}} {{Municipalities in Luxembourg}} [[Category:Municipalities of Luxembourg (Belgium)]] {{LuxembourgBE-geo-stub}}
